welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kilsyth, a charming town nestled in the picturesque countryside of the United Kingdom. Known for its rich history, friendly locals, and stunning landscapes, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Glasgow International Airport is used for overflow flights during peak travel times.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Perth Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Perth Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Edinburgh Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
